rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 07, 07G, 07PG, 11, 42, 50PG, 76, 77, 78}

description: This unit will cover the principles of injury epidemiology, prevention and control. The unit will provide an introduction to the injury epidemiology and prevention field with a particular focus on issues facing injury surveillance, countermeasure development, injury policy and injury burden estimates.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
